= China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 98DX3015 (ARMv5) *Flash/RAM: 16MB SPI Flash, 64MB RAM *32Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *12x GbE ports, 4x shared SFP (RJ-45) slots ==Links of Interest== *[https://dlink-gpl.s3.amazonaws.com/GPL1200118/DGS-1210-16-FOSSCode.rar GPL Firmware] *[https://svanheule.net/switches/dgs-1210_series ''D-Link DGS-1210'' series on '''svanheule''' wiki] 
Revision	Port variants			Hardware platform

A1		10P, 16, 24, 48			Marvell
B1		10P, 20, 28(P), 52		Marvell
C1		10(P), 20, 28(P), 52(P/MP)	Broadcom
F1		10(P/MP), 26, 28(P/MP), 52(MP)	Realtek RTL838x
G1		8P, 10, 16, 24(P), 48		Realtek RTL838x
